WorkflowInfo.Name: Check if service is running
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check if service is running and restart remotely using email
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ServiceStatus;Assembly=ServiceStatus, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ActivityLibrary;Assembly=ActivityLibrary, Version=3.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ServiceStart;Assembly=ServiceStart, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:ServiceStatus IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStatus1" HostName="Localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get Service Status" ServiceName="Spooler" Password="" Description="Gets the selected service status." HostId="1" TypeName="ServiceStatus" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="Running" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Running)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns2:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="Stopped" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Stopped)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:Communicate IsValid="True" x:Name="communicate1" NotifyAll="True" SingleMessageToAll="True" Description="Find responsible person" TypeName="Communicate" SerializedData="User<value>1<value>1<value>00:05:00<value>false<value>false<value><value>false<value><value>Custom<value>Print Spooler on local host is stopped<value>to restart it reply: yes<value>0<value>false<value>1<values>" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns4:ServiceStart IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStart1" HostName="Localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Start Service" ServiceName="Sppoler" Password="" Description="Starts the selected service." HostId="1" TypeName="ServiceStart" UserName="" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Contains("&&&","yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>1</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
